name: wan-video-viewer
description: WAN Video Matrix Viewer - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:nginx" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:nginx: echo 'Checking Nginx...' && cd webapp && (fuser 8888/tcp >/dev/null 2>&1 || nginx -p $PWD -c nginx.conf)
scripts.dev:backend: npm run kill:gunicorn && cd backend && gunicorn --reload -w 2 -k gthread --threads 4 -b 127.0.0.1:5000 wsgi:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd react-frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd react-frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && npm install

author: WAN Video Analysis Team
